law.catch_line: Furnishing of information to complete a vital record.
law.text: Any person having knowledge of the facts necessary to complete a vital record shall furnish the information that person possesses regarding any birth, death, fetal death, induced termination of pregnancy, marriage, or dissolution of marriage or annulment upon request of the cabinet.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 29, effective July 13, 1990.
